testsuite.name: addressbookapp.AddressControllerSpec

testcase.name: Test the index action returns the correct model
Test the create action returns the correct model
Test the save action with a null instance
Test the save action correctly persists
Test the save action with an invalid instance
Test the show action with a null id
Test the show action with a valid id
Test the edit action with a null id
Test the edit action with a valid id
Test the update action with a null instance
Test the update action correctly persists
Test the update action with an invalid instance
Test the delete action with a null instance
Test the delete action with an instance
